data.title: U.S. District Courts
data.meta_description:
U.S. District Courts | 69,755 followers on LinkedIn. Whether you’re an attorney, clerk, human resources specialist, or court interpreter, there is a place for you to support the mission and work of the nation’s 94 U.S. District Courts, also called the trial courts. 

District courts resolve disputes by determining the facts and applying legal principles.
data.text:
The Human Resources Department of the U.S. Court of Appeals for the Seventh Circuit and U.S. District Court, Northern District of Illinois, is now accepting applications for a Human Resources Specialist. Consideration will only be given to those who apply through the court's online applicant tracking system and submit a cover letter, resume and two professional references. To apply, please see “Notice to Applicants” listed below. #communication #vacancy #uscourts #federaljobs #judiciary #districtcourt #humanresourcesspecialist #chicagojobs #illinoisjobs Link to Vacancy: https://lnkd.in/eeUVjMTF

The United States District Court, Northern District of Illinois, is now accepting applications for an Information Technology Technician II. Consideration will only be given to those who apply through the court’s online applicant tracking system and submit a cover letter, resume and two professional references. To apply, please see “Notice to Applicants” listed below. #communication #vacancy #uscourts #federaljobs #judiciary #districtcourt #informationtechnologytechnicianII #chicagojobs #illinoisjobs Link to Vacancy: https://lnkd.in/euCeTjC4

The Clerk’s Office of the United States District Court for the District of Colorado is accepting applications for a Case Administration Specialist. The Case Administration Specialist is primarily assigned to support a select group of judges but is also available for assignment to any judicial officer in the district. #communication #vacancy #uscourts #federaljobs #judiciary #districtcourt #caseadministrationspecialist #fulltimepermanentjobs #denverjobs #coloradojobs Link to Vacancy: https://lnkd.in/g2SeQVR3

Do you enjoy teamwork, service, and being part of something bigger than yourself? If so, the U.S. District Court might be the right place for you. We are publicly funded by people just like you and me – U.S. taxpayers – so, we can’t offer pay and perks you might find in the private sector. However, what we do offer is steady pay, work-life balance, great health/dental/vision benefits, 11 paid holidays off, one of the best 401(k) plans around with a 5% match, a genuine defined pension, tuition reimbursement, telework, and a free annual public transportation pass. If that’s not enough, you will be part of providing equal access to justice for all. #communication #vacancy #uscourts #federaljobs #judiciary #districtcourt #courtroomdeputyclerk #fulltimejobs #permanentjobs #denverjobs #coloradojobs Link to Vacancy: https://lnkd.in/g2SeQVR3

This is a term law clerk appointment to a U.S. Magistrate Judge with the possibility of extension. The Magistrate Judge is pending appointment. This is a full-time position with a one-year term appointment. There is a lifetime limitation of four (4) cumulative years of term clerkship service with the United States Courts. Service as a career law clerk or as a temporary law clerk is not charged against the four-year lifetime limitation. #communication #vacancy #uscourts #federaljobs #judiciary #districtcourt #lawclerk #miamijobs #floridajobs

The Procurement Specialist performs duties which ensure the Court is supplied with the materials, equipment, and services to function optimally. The Procurement Specialist ensures compliance with the appropriate guidelines, policies, and approved internal controls. The incumbent reports to the Finance and Procurement Manager. Occasional travel is required. Limited telework may be available subject to operational needs. Typical work hours are 8:30 a.m. to 5:00 p.m. #communication #vacancy #uscourts #federaljobs #judiciary #districtcourt #procurementspecialist #columbus #ohiojobs Link to Vacancy: https://lnkd.in/g8yzssrV

Applications are invited for the position of Term Law Clerk to United States Magistrate Judge Susan C. Rodriguez based in the Charlotte Division of the United States District Court for the Western District of North Carolina. This position is anticipated to cover a one-year term, though may be extended at the discretion of the successful applicant and Judge Rodriguez for an additional period not to exceed a total of four years. #communication #vacancy #uscourts #federaljobs #judiciary #districtcourt #termlawclerk #charlottejobs #northcarolinajobs Link to Vacancy: https://lnkd.in/eDXcTUZg

The United States District Court for the Northern District of Georgia seeks high achievers interested in a long-term career in public service with the federal judiciary to serve as a generalist clerk in the exciting and growing city of Atlanta, Georgia. The candidate should be well-organized and detail-oriented with exceptional interpersonal skills and a desire to work with and serve the public. #communication #vacancy #uscourts #federaljobs #judiciary #districtcourt #generalistclerk #administrative #atlantajobs #georgiajobs

The United States District Court for the Southern District of Indiana is accepting applications for Judicial Law Clerk(s) to United States Magistrate Judge Crystal Wildeman. Judge Wildeman sits in the Evansville Division in Evansville, Indiana. This position is in Evansville. Responsibilities include management of civil cases, research, preparation of legal memoranda, orders, opinions, reports and recommendations. Other duties include proofreading, verification of citations, assistance in courtroom proceedings, and special projects. #communication #vacancy #uscourts #federaljobs #judiciary #districtcourt #termlawclerk #evansvillejobs #indianajobs Link to Vacancy: https://lnkd.in/ehUyHvDn
